title: Bitcoin Daily Price Dataset (FAIR version)
description: Cleaned and FAIR-structured dataset of daily Bitcoin prices with derived time features. Original Date column has been decomposed into year, month, day, and month name.

column_descriptions.Volume: Trading volume in units of BTC.
column_descriptions.year: Year extracted from the original Date.
column_descriptions.month: Month number extracted from the original Date (1–12).
column_descriptions.day: Day of the month extracted from the original Date (1–31).
column_descriptions.new_mon: Month name extracted from the original Date.

missing_data_strategy: Dropped rows with NaNs and removed Adj Close as redundant.
